author: Josh Barro
title: GOP Senators’ Objection to Expanded Unemployment Benefits Makes Little Sense
description: Work incentives are just such an odd place to focus one’s attention right now. Currently, we need less work in America.
content: The $2 trillion coronavirus rescue package hit a minor snag on Wednesday afternoon when four Republican senators gave a press conference objecting to its unemployment insurance provisions, noting that in some cases the $600-per-week enhancement to unemploymen… [+7550 chars]
